title: (Revocation) Regulations 2022 and come into operation on the 22 December

heading: 2. The following are revoked:
text_raw:
2. The following are revoked: 

(a) 

(b) 

the Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No. 2) Regulations 
2022, and 

the Avian 
(Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

Influenza 

(Temporary Measures) 

(No. 2) 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 December, 2022. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th December, 2022.

title: (Revocation) Regulations 2022 and come into operation on the 22 December
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations provide for the removal of temporary measures formerly in 
place to combat the threat posed by avian influenza in Country Monaghan. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [702]
